thread.title: InventHelp® Client Designs Safe and Convenient Way to Carry Cell Phones (DLL-2807)
thread.title_full: InventHelp® Client Designs Safe and Convenient Way to Carry Cell Phones (DLL-2807)

author: Gia DelliGatti
title: InventHelp® Client Designs Safe and Convenient Way to Carry Cell Phones (DLL-2807)
text:
"I needed a way to carry my cell phone close to my person, especially since I use it as an MP3 player throughout the day," said an inventor from Desoto, Texas. "I was inspired to design a secure and convenient way to do this." He then created a prototype of Pellebon's Forget Me Not, which provides a safe and convenient way to carry a cell phone. It allows for easy access, keeps the phone close to the user’s person, and prevents the phone from being forgotten, lost or damaged. Also, it can be produced in design variations.
 Dallas DLL-2807, //www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp.
